title: Yasuo and the burst of a dedicated assassin.
body: Yasuo doesn't have the amount of burst damage zed,  fizz and katarina do if they land their full combos.  I think that yasuo should be similarly awarded for landing his full combo and I propose that after level 6 yasuo does true damage to airborne units.  Right now his burst is the most measly of any assassin in the game.
